Public Remarks: Julia Island is a 7 acre private island located just off the southwest of Galiano, within 5 minutes of Montague Harbour. Improved with a 2 bedroom cottage & smaller protected dock, Julia is nicely treed & offers a moderate topography with several choice building sites for a new home. The norther end of the island has a very gentle slope that leads down to a small sandstone beach, where the current owner stores rowboats & dinghy's. The dock is perfect for a commuting boat & offers good protection from the winter's prevailing southeasterly winds. Commuting to Julia from Vancouver or Victoria by boat can easily be done year round, or one could keep a boat at Montague Harbour & commute by Ferry.

Over 12,000 sq ft of elegant living space features custom millwork throughout, double heightened grand foyer, Brazilian cherry H/W floors, entertainment sized principal rooms, open concept gourmet kitchen, bright atrium, office, library, enormous sized master bedroom w/his & her ensuites, 5 more bdrms each w/own ensuite, in house elevator & wine cellar. Solidly built w/earthquake proofing, emergency power generator, air conditioning, HRV, 3 car garage & more. Truly stunning.
Realtor Remarks: Measurements by Vancouver Realtor support group. Buyer to verify if important. 'Other' on main is atrium. Ps kindly prequalify your buyer and allow times to show. The house has 8 full baths and 4 half baths.
